title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.6 - Supervision of physical therapist assistants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.6 - Supervision of physical therapist assistants

State Regulations
A physical therapist assistant shall be under the general
supervision of a physical therapist licensed in the State of New York. On-site
supervision as required by section
6738
(a) of the Education Law shall mean that the
supervising physical therapist is physically present in the same facility and
is readily available to the physical therapist assistant, except as otherwise
provided in subdivision (b) of section
6738
of the

Education Law with respect to maintenance programs in residential health care
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
77.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
